name: deployment-guide
steps: 1. Run 'npm run build' in your local project
2. Locate the 'out' folder created by the build
3. Compress the contents of 'out' folder into a ZIP file
4. Upload ZIP to cPanel File Manager
5. Extract ZIP contents to public_html folder
6. Ensure index.html is in the root of public_html
notes: The 'out' folder contains all static files needed for deployment
No server-side functionality will work (API routes, server actions)
All images and assets are included in the build
